member.name: M:Chess_Project_v3._08.MoveProcessing.GenerateKnightMove(Chess_Project_v3._08.LogicSquare[0:,0:],System.Char,Chess_Project_v3._08.LogicSquare,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a single pseudolegal knight move
member.param: The boardstate that the knight move will be searched for on
The type of piece (case determines if it is black or white)
The square that the knight being checked currently occupies
How many squares to the left or right the knight is trying to move
How many squares up or down that the knight is trying to move
member.returns: A list of pseudolegal knight moves (will only ever contain 0 or 1 moves)

member.name: M:Chess_Project_v3._08.MoveProcessing.GeneratePawnMoves(Chess_Project_v3._08.LogicSquare[0:,0:],System.Char,Chess_Project_v3._08.LogicSquare)
member.summary: [UNFINISHED] Generates pseudolegal moves for a pawn
member.param: The boardstate that pawn moves will be searched for on
The type of piece (case determines if it is white or black)
The square that the pawn being checked is currently occupying

member.name: M:Chess_Project_v3._08.MoveProcessing.IsPlayerOneColour(System.Char)
member.summary: Checks if a piece belongs to Player1 (The human player).
member.param: Type of piece (uppercase = White | lowercase = Black)
member.returns: True if piece belongs to PLayer1. False if piece does not belong to Player1.

member.name: M:Chess_Project_v3._08.MoveProcessing.MakeMove(Chess_Project_v3._08.LogicSquare[0:,0:],Chess_Project_v3._08.Move)
member.summary: [UNFINISHED] Simulates making a move on an abstract board
member.param: Board that the move is being made on

member.name: M:Chess_Project_v3._08.MoveProcessing.UnmakeMove(Chess_Project_v3._08.LogicSquare[0:,0:],Chess_Project_v3._08.Move)
member.summary: Simulates unmaking a move on an abstract board
